name: Indiana Bones (ryanenlow)
description:
Indiana Bones is a 2D platformer adventure game. The ever curious Indiana Bones, the main character, has found himself in a series of caverns filled with all sorts of dangers. Chasing after the long lost and sought after Ruby Amulet, you will find numerous items and power-ups to help the spelunking canine navigate through various obstacles and hazards. 

MOVE LEFTLEFT ARROWMOVE RIGHTRIGHT ARROWJUMPUP ARROWUSE ITEMSPACEBARTHROW BOMBLEFT CONTROL
RIGHT CONTROL
